com.github.dm.jrt.object.builder

Class Builders

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dm.jrt.object.builder.Builders

  • public class Builders
extends Object
    Utility class providing helper methods used to implement a builder of routines.
    Specifically, this class provided several utilities to manage routines used to call object methods asynchronously.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 03/23/2015.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Builders.MethodInfo
      Data class storing information about the target method.

      • callFromInvocation

        public static void callFromInvocation(@NotNull
                                      Mutex mutex,
                                      @NotNull
                                      Object target,
                                      @NotNull
                                      Method targetMethod,
                                      @NotNull
                                      List<?> objects,
                                      @NotNull
                                      ResultChannel<Object> result,
                                      @Nullable
                                      AsyncIn.InputMode inputMode,
                                      @Nullable
                                      AsyncOut.OutputMode outputMode)
                               throws Exception
        Calls the specified target method from inside a routine invocation.
        Parameters:
        mutex - the method mutex.
        target - the target instance.
        targetMethod - the target method.
        objects - the input objects.
        result - the invocation result channel.
        inputMode - the input transfer mode.
        outputMode - the output transfer mode.
        Throws:
        Exception - if an unexpected error occurs.

      • getAnnotatedMethod

        @Nullable
public static Method getAnnotatedMethod(@NotNull
                                                  Class<?> targetClass,
                                                  @NotNull
                                                  String name)
        Gets the method annotated with the specified alias name.
        Parameters:
        targetClass - the target class.
        name - the alias name.
        Returns:
        the method.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no method with the specified alias name was found.

      • getInputMode

        @Nullable
public static AsyncIn.InputMode getInputMode(@NotNull
                                                       Method method,
                                                       int index)
        Gets the input transfer mode associated to the specified method parameter, while also validating the use of the AsyncIn annotation.
        In case no annotation is present, the function will return with null.
        Parameters:
        method - the proxy method.
        index - the index of the parameter.
        Returns:
        the input mode.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the method has been incorrectly annotated.
        See Also:
        AsyncIn

public static InvocationMode getInvocationMode(@NotNull

        Gets the routine invocation mode associated to the specified method, while also validating the use of the Invoke annotation.
        In case no annotation is present, the function will return with null.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the input mode.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the method has been incorrectly annotated.
        See Also:

        In case no annotation is present, the function will return with null.

        Throws:

      • getSharedMutex

        @NotNull
public static Mutex getSharedMutex(@Nullable
                                            Object target,
                                            @Nullable
                                            Collection<String> sharedFields)
        Returns the cached mutex associated with the specified target and shared fields.
        If the cache was empty, it is filled with a new object automatically created.
        If the target is null Mutex.NO_MUTEX will be returned.
        Parameters:
        target - the target object instance.
        sharedFields - the shared field names.
        Returns:
        the cached mutex.

                                                               @NotNull
                                                               Method proxyMethod)
        Gets info about the method targeted by the specified proxy one.
        Parameters:

        proxyMethod - the proxy method.
        Returns:
        the method info.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no target method was found.

      • invokeRoutine

        @Nullable
public static Object invokeRoutine(@NotNull
                                             Routine<Object,Object> routine,
                                             @NotNull
                                             Method method,
                                             @NotNull
                                             Object[] args,
                                             @Nullable
                                             InvocationMode invocationMode,
                                             @Nullable
                                             AsyncIn.InputMode inputMode,
                                             @Nullable
                                             AsyncOut.OutputMode outputMode)
        Invokes the routine wrapping the specified method.
        Parameters:
        routine - the routine to be called.
        method - the target method.
        args - the method arguments.
        invocationMode - the routine invocation mode.
        inputMode - the input transfer mode.
        outputMode - the output transfer mode.
        Returns:
        the invocation output.
        Throws:
        RoutineException - in case of errors.
